## Discount interface

Defines an individual discount. A discount can be applied to the cart as a whole or to an item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Discount 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount](./magento-api.discount.amount.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The amount of the discount |
|  [label](./magento-api.discount.label.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | A description of the discount |
